Interested in tennis but unsure of where to find professionally qualified  coaches? Feeling lethargic and needing a good workout? Wanna improve your fitness & health but don't know how? Try Tennis! Tennis Coaching Services is set up to provide professionally run tennis lessons by qualified and internationally accredited coaches for students of all ages and levels. We are known for tailoring our lessons to the needs of individuals. Lessons are conducted on 1 to 1 basis but small group can also be considered. Our rates are highly competitive and afforded. All you need is to decide that you want to learn and play or improve your skills further, choose a day and a time, a venue of your choice and convenience, and we will be there. Call Now! Hd Coach(See Wai)@9 021 7831 with no obligation.

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Upper secondary tuition for: 
 
-Pure chemistry 
-Pure physics 
-Combined science (Phy/chem) 
-E math 
-A math 
 
I will teach you not just the contents of the subject, but how to use tools and techniques (chunking, cluster maps, interleaving) to learn the subject more effectively and score well for your tests.  
 
Why should you sign up for this class? 
 
1. Notes are provided.  
2. Infuse smart study techniques in your learning. 
3. Regular revisions for old topics.   
4. Ask me questions anytime outside class (via WhatsApp) 
5. Maximum 4 students in a group. A lot of focused learning and peer support. 
 
Rates are $35-50/hr.  
2017 classes opens 16 January.
title: Group Tuition In Tampines

Hello, 
 
Are you looking for a tutor to help you practice your Korean and forming sentences?  
 
 
 
 
Or practicing your Korean fluently? 
 
 
 
 
You can meet me through Skype, and you can book my lesson at your convenience through www.tutor-k.com. 
 
 
 
 
I offer customized curriculum based on what you tell me which subject or part you would like to work on. 
 
 
 
 
We will discuss about business and social manners that are required in Korea as well during session.  
 
 
 
 
 
 You can schedule a Korean lesson with me through below link. 
 
 http://www.tutor-k.com/profile/view_profile.php?lmn=120  
 
 You can book me for a trial session or regular session which is for 30 minutes. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
My rates are $7-$13 for 30 minutes.  
 
 
 
 
Group lesson rates are cheaper than private lesson rates. 
 
 
 
 
(Book group lesson with your sister, brother, friend, or family. More people more fun!) 
 
 
 
 
 
 Contact me if you have any questions.
title: Are you looking for a tutor to help you practice your Korean and formi

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
REGISTRATION OPENED FOR 2017 YISHUN PRI - SEC TUITION CLASSES 
 
 The Learning Verve Knowledge Hub 
 
 Pre School, Primary & Sec tuition @Yishun 
thelearningverve.blogspot.com.sg 
thelearningverve.weebly.com 
  9379 4744 
 
 
 
ACE YOUR EXAMS AND SEE IMPROVEMENTS!!! 
Ours students have benefited from our classes. So why wait? 
 
 
 
 9 REASONS WHY YOU SHOULD CHOOSE US 
 
 
 
 
 1. Our commited and caring tutors are diploma - degree holders. We have Ex NIE teachers and Full Time Tutors with proven track records. With classroom teaching experience in government schools, education centres, language schools, community clubs and one to one classes. 
 
  We hope to impart exam learning and solving technique to our students.We are more than just tutors. We mentor our students. We understand each child is unique and learn at different pace and with different style.  
 
 
 
  2. Reasonable fees. We understand that parents want to maximize their investment on their children's education. Hence, our fees are competitive yet reasonable.  
 
 
 
  3. A small class size and teacher : student ratio allows tutor to devote more attention and time to each student and group ensuring optimum performance.  
 
 
 
  4. Regular update to parents via tutor and parents meeting session and sms broadcast. We believe in a clear line of communication with parents. Our customers are the most important people. 
 
 
 
 5. There will be tuition tests in Feb, Apr, Aug and Oct. This allows us to effectively evaluate student's strengths / weaknesses and to work on them.This also allows students to put into practice what has been taught and "warm up" for coming exams. A feedback report will be issued.We also conduct FREE MOTIVATIONAL WORKSHOPS FOR ALL OUR STUDENTS TO BUILD THEIR SELF ESTEEM AND SET GOALS.  
 
 
 
 6. We have 4 systematic and successsful approaches termed the:-" clockwork apporoach""carrot apporach""story telling approach " Goal setting approach" which have benefited our students. Fast and easy technique to tackle exam questions are taught. All while adhering to MOE syllabus.  
 
 
 
  7. We provide challenging in - house worksheet materials prepared by our experienced tutors which mirrors exam based questions to supplement our use of popular assessment books. 
 
 
 
 
 8. Our parents and students have given us favourable testimonials and the "thumbs up". Our student's 2013 and 2014 results and achievements have been very encouraging and a success. They also pick up other intangible skills during our lessons such as being responsible and being discipline. 
 
 
 9. We believe in ' SCR"- sincerity, commitment and being responsible
title: SCORE A. YISHUN TUITION. EXCELLENT PSLE PASS RECORD. 12 YEARS EXP

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Joyce Music Studio (JMS) -- The Piano specialist 
(JMS) is a privately run studio (piano) for discerning talent, young or or not so young, beginner or advance level, to discover their hidden musical prowess. We have been teaching since mid 1970s conducting piano lessons leading to London's Associate Board of Royal Schools of Music (ABRSM) examinations. Our curriculum covers beginner to diploma levels students -  either for exams or leisure. Come and join us for interesting and creative piano/music lessons in a comfortable home-based setting. We conduct individual/group lessons for all ages and experience levels, practical as well theory. Centrally located in of  502 Ang Mio Kio Ave 5, its within easy reach of Ang Mo Kio, Toa Payoh, Braddell, Bishan, Upper Thomson, Yishun, Yio Chu Kang, Kovan, Hougang, Sengkang, serangoon North, Serangoon Gardens , Lorong Ah Soo. The French and Australian International Schools. Call us at 6455 2116 for more information. 
 http://pianoteachersingaporejms.wordpress.com  
A Handful of Reviews from Students & Parents 
Thank you for teaching me. I enjoy your lessons and have learned much. You are a wonderful teacher! -- Audrey Lo 2014 
It has been a wonderful year learning the piano with you as my teacher. Thank you for all your patience and advice and for the knowledge you are imparting to me which is making my dreams come true. -- Kathryn Clarke 2014 
Dear Ms Lo 
Your special once-a-month group lesson is an excellent idea. It gives children an opportunity to showcase their talent, develop self-belief, confidence and improve social interactive skills. Outstanding! ............ Ronda McMahon, Australian International School.   
Dear  Ms Lo, 
Thank you for being such a blessing...for being so tolerant...thank you for believing in me when I was about to give up....for pushing me when I thought I could go no further. Above all, thank you for being my teacher! You are truly a wonderful piano teacher! Happy Teachers' Day!!   . . .. . .. . .. . .. . .. . .. . .  Andrew Ng 
Dear Ms Lo, 
We wish to express our heartfelt gratitude and thanks for your teaching, care and guidance you had given our daughters for the past 9 years. Under your guidance, Li Lian's interest in piano and music had developed beyond our expectation. With your encouragement she has grown from an introvert child into a confident and musically creative teenager. My hushand, Peter and I would like to say A BIG THANK YOU for all the wonderful things you had done for Li Lian. . .. . .. . .. . . Peter & Wee Lee Koh 
Dear Ms Lo, 
Thanks for your feedback. Your advice is noted. We will ensure Amanda spends more time to practise piano pieces. For your information, she was applauded and commended for her fine impromptu performance during the holiday with a chance to demonstrate her piano skill in a birthday banquet held for her grandparents in Shanghai. Many guests asked how and where we could find such a good piano teacher." Regards. . ... LK - Jan                                                    
Dear Ms Lo, 
Season Greetings. Just  like to thank you for your effort in enhancing learning and creativity in your lessons. We believe that the change will definitely go a long way in enabling our girls to be more aware of their potentials. We appreciate your varied teaching methods that is aimed to enrich their learning experience. . .. . .  Mrs June Wong 
Dear Ms Lo, 
Thank you for coaching our son, Aidon. We have seen him gained much confidence while playing on his keyboard. Besides, he no longer finds practicing a chore but enjoys doing it to refine his skills. In the past, we used to see him getting frustrated whenever he's unsure about the pieces he's handling. Yet as parents, we are not able to coach him much as we do not have prior piano experience. We are relieved to see that Aidan is guided closely by you so much so that whenever he's home practicing, he knows exactly what to do, We are very blessed and grateful that Aidan has such a patient and motivating piano teacher like you. We look forword to Aidan taking his Grade 1 piano exam under your professional guidance. Thank again. Regards. . .. . .. . .. . .. . ...Geraldine 
Dear Ms Lo 
Thank you for a job well done. You had boost  Jervis's self esteem. He was feeling rather important about himself. I really appreciate your effort. . .. . .. . .. . ...   Serena Kang, Jervis's mother
title: Music Education - Piano Lessons, Piano Classes

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Always wanted to learn how to play tennis but don't know how to get started. 
Tennis is a fun life long sports where a 7 yrs old child to 70+ yrs can learn and play. A 
great way to keep fit, connect with friends and family bonding activity. 
 
I am FULL TIME Coach with Professional Tennis Registry(PTR) and (AATC)  
International accredited certification with a couple of years of  
coaching experience with Kids, teenager and Adult (beginner and Intermediate).  
 
If you are a beginner looking for a coach to help you learn the right basic 
technique as you embark on this fantastic sports or intermediate player looking 
to brush up your basic tennis stroke, identify and correct your bad or wrong hitting strokes or 
looking to bring your game to the next level , you have come to the right place. 
 
Fun kids lesson with games and using low compression balls and adults individual or group lessons at all location except west area. 
 
Feel free to write to me-Kelvin Goh or watsapps at Tel:9792-6990
title: TENNIS LESSON for Kids and Adults with Pro Tennis Coach

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Hi, my name is Jing and I am a Swimming Instructor specialise in teaching Babies/Toddlers.  
 
I am able to teach all ages from age of 6 months and above and have previously taught at ACS before. 
 
Here are the certifications that I hold: 
 
- LIFESAVING 1, 2, 3 
- RESUSCITATION (CPR), FIRST AID & AED 
- BRONZE MEDALLION 
- SWIM AUSTRALIA™ TEACHER (SAT) 
- SWIM AUSTRALIA™ TEACHER OF BABIES & TODDLERS (SAT B&T) 
- JOEY LINGO™ (a proprietary teaching methodology developed with child psychologists) 
 
I am able to teach in Condominiums and Private pools.  
 
Do contact me at 9171 7537 if you are interested for more information. 
 
Thank you and have a nice day!
title: Swimming Lessons specialise in teaching Babies/Toddlers
